title: Import error after docker build
body_html:
The latest docker build using the Dockerfile seems to throw import error.

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py3.6/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 53, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: libcuda.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Any ideas why? Have built images successfully before (like 2 weeks ago)

body:
The latest docker build using the Dockerfile seems to throw import error. 

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py3.6/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: libcuda.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Any ideas why? Have built images successfully before (like 2 weeks ago)
